entry.title: Insert Images to an Hexo Post
YouCompleteMe Installation
entry.content: InstallationInstall development tools and CMake:yum install build-essential cmake Make sure you have Python headers installed:yum install python-devel rh-python36-python-devel.x86_64 If python3 has not been installed on your CentOS: Enable Software Collections sudo yum install centos-release-scl Install Python3 sudo yum install rh-python36 If you want to use python 3.6 as default scl enable rh-python36 bash Compiling YCM with semantic support for C-family languages: cd ~/.vim/bundle/YouCompleteMe ./install.py --clang-completer Compiling YCM without semantic support for C-family languages: cd ~/.vim/bundle/YouCompleteMe ./install.py cd ~/.vim/bundle/YouCompleteMe ./install.py --all https://github.com/Valloric/YouCompleteMe#full-installation-guide
